<link>http://www.sams.ac.uk/claire-gachon/ALFF</link>        <description>ALFF is a consortium of 10 institutions spread across the EU that will undertake to train a cohort of 15 PhD students from 2015 to 2018. Its scientific focus is on the microbes associated to micro- and macro-algae (the "Algal microbiome"), spanning from mutualistic symbionts down to pathogens.  </description>        <dc:publisher>No
